From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Phobia  , turned and began to run. "This is not my idea of a good time"

The exploding Grenade turned the clone to scrap before his eyes. That was
the end of a tyrant. Phobias logic circuits stepped in, if Megatron was that
weak he would have been wiped out sooner. Regaurdless to say, This megatron
was gone, Inferno and company were defeated, it was a victory.

He looked toward KitKat," If Megatron lives we need to act before he can
counter, if he's dead there will be at least a dozen Preds coming after the
bot that destroyed him. Either way we don't have time to waste, we have to
act now."  He says exploiting the opportunity to achieve his goals.

 . "KitKat, Destructor has a base with the technology to run the tests you
need, send Drillbit back to run the tests while we advance." One bot
wouldn't make a difference in the battles to come, and with Drillbit out of
the way there wouldn't be anything holding KitKat back.

Hellbeast arrived on the scene, Phobia was glad that none of them were
seriously hurt in the battle, they might need thier strength. he stepped
toward Hellbeast, "Why may I ask are you so intent on collecting a sample?"
there had to be a reason that he himself would go, instead of sending a
lackey.

(Speaking of Lackeys) WAspinator arrived following HellBeast toward the
body. Now Phobia knew something was amiss. The tyrant had just been
eliminated and now everyone was ariving for body parts. Phobia decided to
make an example of someone to show that KitKat's faction was not to be taken
lightly, he looked Waspinator in the eye and fired optic blasts from all
eight eyes.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 10, 2000 5:20 AM
Subject: Re: time to attack


> OK, I ,by the grace of the matrix, got my home comupter working for
> the moment. So I will try to post through out the day.
>
> ::KitKat::
> She dug her heels in to stop as she saw Phobia get in between her and
> Megatron. She looked at Phobia like he was crazy. "WHAT IN THE PIT!
> Get out of the way before he slags us both!" She grabbed one of her
> two grenades and pulled the pin.  She threw it and watched it come to
> rest right between Megatron's feet.  She then smiled and looked at
> Phobia. "RUN! NOW!" She turned and ran, heading towards Inferno and
> Starscream.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Phobia thought about the sudden arival of Megatron on the scene.
> Blasts were
> > coming his way. He quickly transformed to robot and got between
> Megatron and
> > KitKat. he folded his spider legs in front of him as a shield
> blocking the
> > shots. "Get to cover, I've a fealing this isn't as easy as it
> seems."
